title: Spain and Italy Play for the Davis Cup Trophy
summary: Spain has reached the Davis Cup final for the first time in six years by beating Germany in a close match. They won the deciding doubles game to set up a final against Italy. Spain is trying to win the Davis Cup for the seventh time. Italy is the two-time defending champion and also reached the final by beating Belgium. Both teams are missing their top players due to injuries, like Carlos Alcaraz for Spain and Jannik Sinner for Italy. The final will be played in Bologna, Italy, on Sunday. Spain's captain, David Ferrer, is proud of his team and says they will rest and get ready for the tough match ahead.

background_read: The Davis Cup is an international tennis tournament started in 1900 where teams from different countries compete. It is like the World Cup for tennis. Spain has won it six times before, and Italy is the current champion. Top players sometimes miss games if they are injured, which makes it harder for their teams. The final is a big event watched by many fans around the world.
